metadataAttributes.Title: AI Workflow: Machine Learning, Visual Recognition and NLP
metadataAttributes.Short Intro: This is the fourth course in the IBM AI Enterprise Workflow Certification specialization.    You are STRONGLY encouraged to complete these courses in order as they are not individual independent courses, but part of a workflow where each course builds on the previous ones.
metadataAttributes.Skills: Data Science,Information Engineering,Artificial Intelligence (AI),Machine Learning,Python Programming,
